headline: Halliburton (NYSE:HAL) Appoints Stephanie Holzhauser As New Senior Vice President
summary: Halliburton (NYSE:HAL) announced a significant executive change with Stephanie Holzhauser set to assume the role of Senior Vice President and Chief Accounting Officer. This announcement coincides with a 10% rise in Halliburton's stock over the past week, a movement potentially influenced by the company's internal restructuring amid broader market stability. The market remained largely unchanged, with major indices close to record levels despite external uncertainties, such as new tariff...

headline: Energy Is Taking a Hit Today. Oil Prices Are Lower.
summary: Oil prices and energy-related stocks were down across the board on Monday morning.  WTI crude prices, the U.S. benchmark, are down 0.1% today to $64.27 a barrel.  The S&P 500 energy sector is the biggest loser of the day so far, down 1.1%.

headline: Halliburton Announces New Chief Accounting Officer
summary: HOUSTON, July 14, 2025--Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL) today announced a change to the company’s senior executive leadership as part of its succession management process. Effective July 16, 2025, Stephanie Holzhauser will assume the role of senior vice president and chief accounting officer. She replaces Charles Geer Jr. who is departing for an executive role at another company.
